title: Linux Mint Unveils A New User Support App: Jargonaut
description:
In the monthly update, the Linux Mint team introduces a new app in the works: Jargonaut.

The post Linux Mint Unveils A New User Support App: Jargonaut appeared first on Linux Today.

title: openSUSE Leap 15.6 Is Now Available for Public Beta Testing With GNOME 45
description:
Powered by the Linux 6.4 kernel series and built on top of SUSE Linux Enterprise 15 Service Pack 6 (SP6), openSUSE Leap 15.6 Beta ships with the KDE Plasma 5.27 LTS and GNOME 45 desktop environment series.

The post openSUSE Leap 15.6 Is Now Available for Public Beta Testing With GNOME 45 appeared first on Linux Today.
